Name: DetlevCM
AboutMe:
In 2015 I obtained a PhD in working on the general subject of Aviation Fuel Thermal Stability, focussing on some of the fundametal aspects of hydrocarbon thermal stability for normal and iso paraffinic hydrocarbons. Before the PhD I obtained a BSc in Mathematics in 2011.

I program primarily for research related topics, however it can also include little tools where I find them useful - the public codes can be found on Github: https://github.com/DetlevCM/ Further I am a hobby photographer - more details are to be found on my website: http://detlevcm.eu (also Flickr & 500px)

A free basic guide to photography written by me is available at: https://detlevcm.wordpress.com
